name: Deconstructed Knit Sweater
description: Heavy gauge wool sweater with a destroyed, laddered knit. Features elongated sleeves and a cropped, raw hem for a fragmented silhouette.

name: Monolith Combat Boots
description: Exaggerated platform combat boots crafted from matte leather. Features a brutalist silhouette and a side-zip closure for a seamless profile.

name: Cargo Bondage Trousers
description: Multi-pocket cargo pants in waxed canvas with detachable bondage straps. A staple of the antagonist uniform.

name: Phantom Knit Balaclava
description: Distressed knit balaclava with a deconstructed weave. Full face coverage for maximum anonymity and a menacing profile.

name: Asymmetrical Zip Hoodie
description: Heavyweight cotton fleece with an off-center zip and an oversized, pointed hood. Batwing sleeves and concealed side pockets.

name: Structured Shoulder Blazer
description: A single-breasted blazer cut from heavy wool. Features aggressive, padded shoulders and a sharp, elongated silhouette. Finished with a single, black-metal button.

name: Ribbed Muscle Tank
description: Washed black ribbed cotton tank top with a deep scoop neck and raw, cut-off armholes. The perfect underlayer for leather.

name: Leather Corset Top
description: Paneled lambskin leather corset with a structured, pointed hemline and a lace-up back. Designed to be worn as a statement piece or layered over a sheer top.

name: Shredded Asymmetrical Skirt
description: A multi-layered skirt made from panels of shredded jersey and sheer mesh. Features an uneven, raw-edge hemline that moves like smoke.

name: Sigil Graphic Longsleeve
description: Oversized cotton longsleeve with a cracked-ink sigil graphic printed down each arm. Features a dropped shoulder and a faded, vintage wash.

name: Anarchy Leather Jacket
description: Hand-distressed grain leather jacket with custom silver hardware and an asymmetrical zip. Built for the night and designed to last an eternity.
